title: Who is the ultimate badass in fiction?
body: I say it's Rand al'Thor from the Wheel of Time series. He's the most powerful channeler in history (can use a "weave" --The kind of magic used in WoT--to obliterate things from past,present, and future), a blademaster (wins 4+ vs 1), an emperor, a lady's man (3 GFs that all know about each other)
